item.title: Well, well, well...
item.description:
Well, well, well...

Look who said they wouldn't roll their own blog and RSS, and here they are anyway!

This is all super basic, feel free to check out the source code in the usual place. I'll be using it mostly for unserious writing, don't expect big tech guides or anything. (that's coming in the book ðŸ‘€)
